sn35.139:1.2: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.139:1.5: te pajahatha. Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.139:1.11: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.139:1.12: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṁ imasmiṁ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭha …pe…
sn35.139:1.13: evameva kho, bhikkhave, rūpā na tumhākaṁ; te pajahatha.
sn35.139:1.14: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissantī”ti ….
